vip_1_desc:
Charge $1 to become VIP1  and get following privilege：

Space Coin got from Stroy Mode [color=ffff7800]increases to 5%[/color]
Everyday Energon recovery times increases to [color=ffff7800]3[/color]
Tech cooling time upper limit increases to [color=ffff7800]30 minutes[/color]
You can purchase[color=ffff7800]VIP1 Pack[/color]
vip_2_desc:
Charge $10 to become VIP2 and get following privilege：

Unlock the [color=ffff7800]Skip[/color] function in battle
Challenge times can be reset[color=ffff7800]1[/color]
Tech cooling time upper limit increases to [color=ffff7800]60 minutes[/color]
You can purchase [color=ffff7800]VIP2 Pack[/color],
which contains all previous privilege
